response.overview: A group of old time friends get together at their usual spot, an abandoned house in the outskirts of the city. While they are sitting in a circle talking, a noise becomes louder and louder. A sort of buzzing sound that comes from somewhere inside the house. They start searching the house for the origin of the sound and finally find it in a room: A rectangle on the floor, the size of a single bed, that emits a strong red light. They feel magically drawn to walk into the light. Even though they are scared, they can not resist. What happens next is out of this world - or to be precise - out of this dimension.
response.title: Another Sex Dimension
